"
Test Case 4: Same Arrival Time and Same Burst Time

Purpose:
This test case checks how SJF behaves when all processes have equal
arrival and burst times.

Description:
All processes arrive at the same time with identical burst times.
No process has priority based on burst length.

Expected Behavior:
Processes execute in First-Come-First-Serve (FCFS) order.

P1,0,10
P2,1,5
P3,2,8
P4,3,6
P5,4,2
